flavorText.text:
たくさんの　むれで　こうどうする。
からだは　ちいさいが　はばたく
ちからは　ひじょうに　つよい。

むしポケモンを　ねらって　のやまを
おおぜいの　むれで　とびまわる。
なきごえが　とても　やかましい。

たくさんの　むれで　こうどうする。
からだは　ちいさいが　はばたく
ちからは　ひじょうに　つよい。

むしポケモンを　ねらって　のやまを
おおぜいの　むれで　とびまわる。
なきごえが　とても　やかましい。

많은 수가 무리를 이루어
행동한다. 몸은 작지만
날개 치는 힘은 매우 강하다.

벌레 포켓몬을 노리고 산과 들을
많은 무리로 날아다닌다.
울음소리가 무척 시끄럽다.

많은 수가 무리를 이루어
행동한다. 몸은 작지만
날개 치는 힘은 매우 강하다.

벌레 포켓몬을 노리고 산과 들을
많은 무리로 날아다닌다.
울음소리가 무척 시끄럽다.

La faiblesse des Étourmi les force
à vivre en groupe, mais ils se
chamaillent souvent.

La faiblesse des Étourmi les force
à vivre en groupe, mais ils se
chamaillent souvent.

Ils volent en nombre. Bien que minuscule, il bat
des ailes avec une vigueur impressionnante.

Ce Pokémon très bruyant parcourt champs et forêts
en nuées pour chasser les Pokémon Insecte.

Ils volent en nombre. Bien que minuscule, il bat des ailes
avec une vigueur impressionnante.

Ce Pokémon très bruyant parcourt champs et forêts en nuées
pour chasser les Pokémon Insecte.

Ihr Schwarm ist stets groß. Obwohl es kleine Pokémon
sind, schwingen sie ihre Flügel mit enormer Kraft.

Auf der Suche nach Käfer-Pokémon fliegen Schwärme
von ihnen durchs Land. Ihr Ruf erzeugt großen Lärm.

Ihr Schwarm ist stets groß. Obwohl es kleine Pokémon sind,
schwingen sie ihre Flügel mit enormer Kraft.

Auf der Suche nach Käfer-Pokémon fliegen Schwärme
von ihnen durchs Land. Ihr Ruf erzeugt großen Lärm.

Viaja en grandes bandadas. Aunque es pequeño,
agita las alas con gran fuerza.

Sobrevuela los campos buscando Pokémon de tipo
Bicho. Chilla de forma muy estridente.

Viaja en grandes bandadas. Aunque es pequeño, agita las
alas con gran fuerza.

Sobrevuela los campos buscando Pokémon de tipo Bicho.
Chilla de forma muy estridente.

Si muove in grandi gruppi. Anche se piccolo, batte
le ali in maniera molto energica.

Saltella per i campi in grandi stormi a caccia di
Pokémon Coleottero. Emette versi davvero acuti.

Si muove in grandi gruppi. Anche se piccolo, batte le ali
in maniera molto energica.

Saltella per i campi in grandi stormi a caccia di Pokémon
Coleottero. Emette versi davvero acuti.

They flock in great numbers.
Though small, they flap their
wings with great power.

Usually with a large flock, it is
barely noticeable when alone.
Its cries are very strident.

Because they are weak individually,
they form groups. However, they
bicker if the group grows too big.

They flock around mountains and
fields, chasing after bug Pokémon.
Their singing is noisy and annoying.

fields, chasing after bug Pokémon.
Their singing is noisy and annoying.

they form groups. However, they
bicker if the group grows too big.

they form groups. However, they
bicker if the group grows too big.

they form groups. However, they
bicker if the group grows too big.

they form groups. However, they
bicker if the group grows too big.

They flock in great numbers. Though small, they
flap their wings with great power.

They flock around mountains and fields, chasing
after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy
and annoying.

They flock in great numbers. Though small, they
flap their wings with great power.

They flock around mountains and fields, chasing
after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy
and annoying.

They live in the fields and mountains, gathering in large flocks.
Their cries are quite obnoxious. Though small, their wings are
strong—a strike from them leaves pain that persists for a week.
